channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [DERBY-4392] "Table/View / Constraint already exists in Schema 'APP'" in lang.CheckConstraintTest on phoneME/cvm
item.description:
Seen since 2009-07-03. Possibly related to DERVY-4248 / svn 796893?

See e.g.
http://dbtg.foundry.sun.com/derby/test/Daily/javaME/testing/testlog/ubuntu/820325-suitesAll_diff.txt

1) testPositionalUpdate(org.apache.derbyTesting.functionTests.tests.lang.CheckConstraintTest)java.sql.SQLException: Table/View 'T1' already exists in Schema 'APP'.

item.summary: "Table/View / Constraint already exists in Schema 'APP'" in lang.CheckConstraintTest on phoneME/cvm

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: I think fixture execution order is the issue here too, as in DERBY-4393.
CheckConstraintTest.testBuiltInFunctions() should do clean up: drop all created tables.
Thanks for tracking this down, Ole. Your proposed fix seems fine to me.
DERBY-4392_1.diff.txt was committed to trunk with revision 821711
